title: after i have successfully installed pytorch , it seems i can only execute  *.py script  in the pytorch-master  dir
body_html:
after i have successfully installed pytorch , it seems i can only execute *.py script in the pytroch-master directory, anyone know why?
eg, if i create a folder in the pytorch-master ,and cd to this subfolder to execute script , it always report error, but when i copy this script to the pytorch-master, everything is ok.
body_text:
after i have successfully installed pytorch , it seems i can only execute  *.py script  in the pytroch-master  directory, anyone know why?
eg, if i create a folder in the pytorch-master ,and cd to this subfolder  to execute script , it always report error, but when i copy this script to the pytorch-master, everything is ok.
body:
after i have successfully installed pytorch , it seems i can only execute  *.py script  in the pytroch-master  directory, anyone know why?
 eg, if i create a folder in the pytorch-master ,and cd to this subfolder  to execute script , it always report error, but when i copy this script to the pytorch-master, everything is ok.
